alert.note: Alert for Lincoln; Logan; Morgan; Phillips; Sedgwick; Washington (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Air Quality Alert issued April 07 at 11:11AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...AIR QUALITY HEALTH ADVISORY FOR BLOWING DUST FROM 1100 AM THURSDAY UNTIL 600 PM THURSDAY... The Colorado Department of Public Health and Environment has issued the following... WHAT...Air Quality Health Advisory for Blowing Dust. WHERE...Sedgwick, Logan, Phillips, Morgan, Yuma, Washington, Kit Carson, Lincoln and Kiowa Counties. Locations include, but are not limited to Julesburg, Sterling, Holyoke, Fort Morgan, Wray, Akron, Burlington, Limon and Eads. WHEN...1100 AM Thursday April 07 to 600 PM Thursday April 07 IMPACTS...Areas of blowing dust will impact the advisory area Thursday afternoon. Dust will gradually decrease during the late afternoon hours. HEALTH INFORMATION...Public Health Recommendations: Increasing likelihood of respiratory symptoms in sensitive individuals, aggravation of heart or lung disease and premature mortality in people with cardiopulmonary disease and older adults. People with heart or lung disease, older adults, and children should reduce prolonged or heavy exertion.

area.areaDesc: Lincoln; Logan; Morgan; Phillips; Sedgwick; Washington
